title: Dragon Trist Quotes
body: She still uses old quotes sometimes, 'a Bandle gunner never turns tail, unless its to taunt you.' Among others

replies.body:
Hey Sirsir! 

Thanks for reporting this! Did you notice any specific times this was happening? Was it at the beginning of the game? Did you happen to have a Lulu on the enemy team?

Super duper late... sry I don't get on here often. 
 
There was a lulu in one, not sure about the other, and it happened relatively late in the game, around the 20-30 minute mark
